descriptionHtml:
[center][b][url=http://xeniusmods.tumblr.com/]Follow my blog on Tumblr for the latest news on upcoming releases, progress reports, beta releases, and more![/url][/b][/center]

Gizmodian\'s Scars
by Gizmodian & Xenius

>> Description

Replaces all of the scars (except beast races) with high resolution ones (1024 vs 128).
Textures and normal maps were created by me using the resources
provided by [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=341209]Gizmodian[/url].

>> Installation

Use 7zip or WinRar to extract the files.
Move the Data folder to your Skyrim folder.

You can find the Skyrim folder here: Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim

To those who are new to using Elder Scrolls mods:

- You do not have to extract the .bsa archives. The folder provided by
this mod has the same structure as the inside of the .bsa archive, it will
override the textures that are included in the .bsa file.
- Do not worry about the Data folder that already exists, the folder provided
by this mod will be merged with the existing folder, it will not be overwritten.

>> Uninstallation

Remove the following files:
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female\\facedetails\\*.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\male\\facedetails\\*.dds

>> Compatibility

Compatible with any other mod that\'s not a scar replacement

>> Change Log

[13-12-11] 1.00 Release

>> Credits

Thanks a lot to Gizmodian for the scar and warpaint resources

>> Distribution Permission

The content of this mod is open source and can be used freely on the following conditions:

- You will credit us
- You will notify us
author: Gizmodian and Xenius
